subject: Incorrect contact information email on order
description_text:
Hi Team,

I ordered a set of Pedals
My order number is: #SSN4369

I’ve no issues with the order however I did use the incorrect contact
information. I accidentally used rhys@gmail.com instead of my email
rhysmg@gmail.com

Please see screenshot below of the contact information on the order number
above.



Is it possible to have this corrected, I understand it is my mistake. If
you can’t updated it from your side could you forward the confirmation
email to my email above rhysmg@gmail.com ?

Looking forward to hearing from you

Kind regards
Rhys

conversations.body_text: Hi rhys mc grath,    Okay, we've updated your email address and resent the order confirmation.
